question: Hi,My mother,44 years, has been suffering from Diabetes for over 8 years. She also has high BP. Recently, she took her blood tests and found that her Creatinine level has shot up to 9.1What I wanted to know was:1) Can this creatinine level be brought down?2) If not, can this be maintained?3) Is there a prescribed diet(with example of meal and fruit) or exercise for this?4) Can she prevent the kidney from furtehr damage?5) At what level is dialysis required? Can this be avoided?Thanks,Manish
title: Reply PLZ
